0.9.name: wordpress/wordpress-scheduled-time
0.9.description:
When you're having a large blog and post mulitple blogposts per day with multiple authors it can be very interesting to see the actual time a post is scheduled. Standard WordPress behaviour is that you only see the scheduled date when a post is scheduled. This plugin's main feature is that is displays also the WordPress Scheduled Post TIME.

Other features:

  • Sorable Column on Post Status
  • Gives a clear overview if a post is published/scheduled/draft/pending review or Trashed with different colors.
